segments.text: Hello . This is Mrs . Wilson . I'd like to buy a new car . Could you offer me a new type of the car , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A new car . And I've got a small family , two children , and I haven't got a lot of money and ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , oh , Madam , Madam , I'm afraid you have the wrong number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , sorry . Do you know the number for a car store , then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I don't . I suggest you look in the phone book .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry to have bothered you .
segments.speaker: S1
